scripts.compile-dist: npm run clean-dist && node-sass --output-style expanded --output dist src/css
scripts.compile-dev-framework-css: npm run clean-dev-framework-css && node-sass --output-style expanded --output examples/css/framework src/css
scripts.compile-dev-app-css: npm run clean-dev-app-css && node-sass --output-style expanded --output examples/css src/examples/css
scripts.compile-sources: npm run clean-sources && node-sass --output-style expanded --output src/__original-bootstrap-sources/compiled src/__original-bootstrap-sources/indexes
